scenario.description: Anomalies in Api calls will be detected using linear regression over a defined number of events and those anomalies will be sent to the predefined alert stream

parameter.name: referenceType
parameter.description: The name of the reference type (This should have a unique value if you creating another)

parameter.name: calculationInterval
parameter.description: The frequency of regression calculation

parameter.name: batchSize
parameter.description: The maximum number of events used for a regression calculation

parameter.name: confidenceInterval
parameter.description: Confidence Interval to be used for regression calculation

parameter.name: range
parameter.description: Number of standard deviations from the regression equation

parameter.name: email
parameter.description: Email address
